[font size=5]Trinket Armor: Reduce 1 incoming damage per armor.
[font size=5]Trinket Bandaid: Heal 1 Heart per bandaud when entering a shop.
Weapon Bubble: Shoot bubbles to capture enemies and push them back. Deals damage when popped. Aims at random targets.
Weapon Flail: Hit enemies in an arc around you. Aims at the closest enemy if possible.
Trinket Shades: Look cool and stylish whit these [rainbow]RAD[/rainbow] shades! Oh and, something, something, critical bonuses.
[font size=5]Weapon Knives: Throw knives at enemies. Will target enemies in range.
Increase your character level by [color=green]1[/color]. Increases damage, movement speed, critical chance and critical damage.
[font size=5][color=a5320b][shake]PROTEIN[/shake]! GET YOUR MUSCLE ON AND DO MORE DAMAGE WITH PROTEIN!
[font size=5]Weapon Tornados: Spawn tornados at random positions on the map that move towards you.
[font size=5]Weapon Signs: [color=darkred]Interdiction[/color] signs spin around you.
Weapon Radiation: An area of [color=yellow]radiation[/color] around you deals damage to enemies
Woah, woah, woah, woah, woah! What's going on here?
Why are you not dead? What is the meaning of this?
Who are you anyways? You know what? I don't care. I'm just going to make sure this doesn't happen again.
Let's reset you... 3 [color=red]hearts[/color]? Check. Zero [color=gold]coins[/color]? Check. One [color=purple]weapon[/color]? Check. Get rid of [color=blue]trinkets[/color]? Check.
Ok, you've done that enough. Let's see if you can do it again.
And off to the start you go!
It seems I have misjudged you. A mistake I will not do a second time.
It is time to remove the kid gloves. Let's see if you can do this with even more enemies.
It seems, that also was a waste. Time for some more drastic measures.
Let's see if the future can [color=lightpink]contend[/color] with you. Well, [color=green]your[/color] future that is.
Alright. Let's crank the [color=red]difficulty[/color] up again!
[font size=8][shake]ARRGGH![/shake] WHAT IS THE MEANING OF THIS?!?!
[font size=6]YOU SHALL KNOW THE [pulse]WRATH[/pulse] OF [shake][ghost]DEATH[/ghost][/shake]! ONE DOES NOT SIMPLY WALK INTO MY DOMAIN!
To the past. And let's make sure you can't do much! No Trinkets! No other weapons, Just the [color=yellow]Radiation[/color]!
HOW?! You have the worst weapon possible! OK! No more Mister Nice [ghost freq=5.0 span=10.0][shake]Death[/shake][/ghost]. No weapons, no chance!
Please stop. No more. I give up. You win. I can't kill you. You can't die. Whatever is going on, I don't like it.
Let's just call it quits and never speak of this ever again. Ok?
Congratulations! You have survived not dying. It appears [ghost][shake]Death[/shake][/ghost] was unable to kill you. As a reward, have my [rainbow]thanks[/rainbow] for playing.

[center]No Deaths, Reapers, Charon, Hades, Lucifers, Pluto, Hel, Kali, Anubis, Ah Puch, Mictlantecuhtli, Shinigami, Yama, or any other non-denominational  Deiti or representation of death has been harmed in the process of making this game.[/center]
